name: Clothes On My Back, Things In The Sack
name_original: Clothes On My Back, Things In The Sack
description:
Get that sweet Pawn money, baby! But beware... Possessions can be such a burden... Ludum Dare 45 submission! Instructions
  1. Steal Things
  2. Don't get Caught
  3. Pawn The Goods
  4. Win at life
Controls
  • WASD = Movement
  • [SPACE] = Pickpocket
Tips!
  • Items have Debuffs!
  • Don't get Caught!
  • Watch the Timer!
  • Yes, there's only two levels currently >.>
The Team Wyatt Schiffer 

Production, Design, Art, VO

Max Himmel

Engineering, Design

Art

Audio
